mapper.select: SELECT C.PROJ_NO, A.TAG_NO, A.TAG_NAME FROM TAG A JOIN PROJECT_TAG B ON A.TAG_NO = B.TAG_NO JOIN PROJECT C ON B.PROJ_NO = C.PROJ_NO WHERE C.PROJ_NO = #{projNo}

SELECT B.TAG_NO ,A.PROJ_NO , ,A.TITLE AS PROJECT_TITLE ,A.STARTDATE AS START_DATE ,A.ENDDATE AS END_DATE , ,D.NICKNAME AS LEADER FROM PROJECT A JOIN PROJECT_TAG B ON(A.PROJ_NO = B.PROJ_NO) JOIN USER_PROJECT C ON(A.PROJ_NO = C.PROJ_NO) JOIN "USER" D ON(C.USER_ID = D.USER_ID) WHERE B.TAG_NO = #{tagNo} AND C.ROLE = 'A303'
mapper.sql: (SELECT CODE_NAME FROM COMMON_CODE WHERE COMMON_CODE.CODE_NO = A.STATUS) AS STATUS
(SELECT TAG_NAME FROM TAG WHERE TAG_NO = #{tagNo}) AS TAG_NAME
